t: Amazon and Hyundai launch a broad, strategic partnership—including vehicle sales on Amazon.com in 2024
s: Hyundai has also selected AWS as its preferred cloud provider and next-generation Hyundai vehicles will be even more responsive and interactive with Alexa Built-in. ... As shared by Amazon CEO Andy Jassy, Amazon and Hyundai Motor Company have announced a broad strategic partnership.

t: Hyundai Motor: First auto brand available for purchase on Amazon Autos - KED Global
s: January 8, 2025 - Hyundai Motor America, the US affiliate of South Korea’s top automaker Hyundai Motor Co., said on Wednesday it is now selling cars directly on Amazon, including popular electric vehicles such as the 2025 model of the IONIQ 5, the IONIQ 6 sedan and the soon-to-be-launched IONIQ 9.
Shop for your new Hyundai on Amazon

t: Hyundai Provides a Digital "Showroom" on Amazon.com - Hyundai Newsroom
s: Hyundai’s showroom on Amazon.com takes prospective car buyers on a customer journey, starting with a “brand experience” page highlighting the latest in Hyundai technology and automotive innovation. From there, customers can learn about Hyundai Assurance, receive details on vehicles that ...

t: Hyundai and Amazon Evolve the Digital Retail Experience - Hyundai Newsroom
s: Customers can configure and estimate the price of their desired Hyundai vehicle, locate real-time inventory and contact dealers to complete the sale. The Hyundai Evolve showroom can be found at Amazon.com/Hyundai.

t: You can buy your next Hyundai car on Amazon in these 48 US cities
s: December 10, 2024 - It’s still early for us and we welcome customer and dealer feedback as we continue to add new functionality, expand to additional brands, and iterate on the customer experience.” · For dealers, Amazon Autos offers a new sales channel that connects them with millions of Amazon customers.

t: Hyundai and Amazon Partner to Deliver Innovative Customer Experiences and Cloud Transformation - Hyundai Newsroom
s: For more information, visit amazon.com/about and follow @AmazonNews. About Hyundai Motor Company Established in 1967, Hyundai Motor Company is present in over 200 countries with more than 120,000 employees dedicated to tackling real-world mobility challenges around the globe.

t: Amazon Auto launches in the US; Hyundai cars now available for purchase on the platform | Technology News - The Indian Express
s: December 11, 2024 - Amazon shoppers in 48 American cities can buy vehicles listed for sale by local Hyundai car dealers directly on the platform.

t: Hyundai Becomes First Brand To Sell Cars On Amazon
s: November 17, 2023 - Hyundai announced Thursday that it will be the first brand to sell cars on Amazon starting in 2024. This somewhat dystopian announcement is intended to bring ease to the car buying process, and will allow purchasers the option to receive delivery of their new car directly to their home, or ...

t: You Can Finally Buy A Brand-New Hyundai On Amazon
s: December 10, 2024 - If you’ve been wanting to buy a new Hyundai but you haven’t wanted to deal with one of their notoriously crappy dealers, Amazon just saved you a trip. The online retail giant has finally rolled out its online car buying tool for Hyundai that has been in the works for over a year.

t: Hyundai And Amazon: Steering The Auto Industry In A Digital Direction
s: May 9, 2024 - There are three big reasons why the new Amazon and Hyundai partnership could herald a new age for how U.S. consumers will begin to purchase automobiles online.
